    Hi! I'm Thi ツ

    I'm a Vietnamese guy who has a curious mind. I'd like to learn something new every day. I'm a PhD in Applied Maths and currently a Data Scientist. You find in this site my notes which are taken when I've found something new in Data Science and Web Developement.
